extendedInfo.description: Multiple Push email access + Hotmail contacts on your Android!MULTIPLE PUSH EMAILSAdd up to 2 email accounts to your Android:*  Login with Windows Live Hotmail account (such as hotmail.com or msn.com or live.com) *  Setup another company or personal POP3/IMAP email account. Also include Google Mailâ¢ or Premium Yahoo!Â® Mail or AOLÂ® Mail and etcPUSH & COMPRESSION TECHNOLOGYGet your multiple emails Push to you with compression technology to save on data usage up to 50 times lesser (check your data usage at Main Menu/About).MANAGE YOUR PUSH EMAILS & EMAIL ATTACHMENTSReply, Forward and Quick preview of your Attachments without the need for 3rd-party Attachment Reader.  This mobile application runs in the background so you are always online and ready to get your emails push to your Android phone.CONTACTSOn-the-go access and update your Hotmail contacts from your Android. Ability to add email contacts when sending emails.GREAT SAVINGS ON CALLS & SMSCommunicate with your friends and contacts on-the-go, email to ringEmail@clearhub.com and request for a trial to help you enjoy more than 90% savings on Local and International Calls & SMS.FEEDBACKPlease help us to improve the mobile app. Share your feedback to android@clearhub.com**Please Read**In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen.Search shortcut on your bookmarks and browser homepage.This will help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), delete the bookmarks and change the browser homepage from the settings.This will not affect the application in any way.***

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: Just got ripped off. Ads came back despite paying to get rid off them.  Options totally limited. NO PUSH TECH AT ALL! Had to open it all the time to download new mail.
reviews.author: Alfonso Zambrano

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: I can\'t get any mail throught this app. It said  \'\'connecting....\'\' and when it connected?  No mail. DO NOT DOWLOAD!!!
reviews.author: Steven McGuire

reviews.title: Horrible!!
reviews.comment: Biggest waste of time ever. THIS ISNT MSN HOTMAIL!! Was in a hurry and thought I was downloading the ACTUAL Hotmail ap. Have ads randomly popping up now, I have had to reset my MSN password because it \"somehow\" got hacked and sent a couple hundred junk emails. I have had/ used my same email account since 1995 without evyer having an issue until now. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
reviews.author: chris herr

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: So many ads and it installed spam on my device. Not to mention it doesn\'t work half the time.
reviews.author: Matt Kuffel

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Saying I have no messages when I get loads and my ipad is constantlypinging with them. Can\'t send emails either. Had to remove
reviews.author: Kate Haywood

reviews.title: It\'s a scam
reviews.comment: As soon as I installed, Sophos reported it as malicious.
reviews.author: Felix Nodar

reviews.title: If i could give zero stars i would
reviews.comment: I had the app for just a couple minutes. There was an insane amount of push ads and other ads, of course. It kept telling me that i had an unread message but when i clicked on mail, it told me there was no email, this it\'s also wrong because i have lots of emails. This app is 100% useless.
reviews.author: Jessica Lema

reviews.title: Most anemic e-mail app ever
reviews.comment: I don\'t know how much Microsoft spent to develop this app, but, whatever the amount, it was a waste of time and money. All it allows me to do is read or delete the most current 20 or so messages and be supremely annoyed that I can\'t do ANYTHING else with them.
reviews.author: Cathy York

reviews.title: This is a poot excuse for an app
reviews.comment: Do not I repeat do not install. Uninstall.
reviews.author: Tyler Gill

reviews.title: Bad app!!!!
reviews.comment: I can never log into my account. It always says \"Signing In\". Useless piece of crap!!! Plus I am constantly getting ads on my phone.
reviews.author: Jaclyn Harrison

reviews.title: Won\'t sign in
reviews.comment: It works about once every two days so if that is how often you get an email then this app is perfect for you
reviews.author: michael starr

reviews.title: Will not open
reviews.comment: When trying to log in, the app has done it once. Does not open now on either 3G or WiFi. Having to use internet now instead of app.
reviews.author: kirsty francis

reviews.title: Junk
reviews.comment: Ads are invasive and I am shocked by the malware it downloads. Avoid like the plague.
reviews.author: P Shah

reviews.title: Aweful
reviews.comment: Puts spam on my phone. Paid to remove ads but they are still there. Worst app ever.
reviews.author: MELINDA BROCK

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Absolute bullcrap too many ads, no button anywhere to refresh to see new emails, couldn\'t see any new emails.  To hard to use and did I mention ads? I paid the $1 The first time I opened the app. I opened it again the next day and have Ads again.
reviews.author: Ryan Meddings

reviews.title: was all spam!
reviews.comment: We never got past all the spam to read any mail.   I deleted it and told wife to change password.  Whew!   Doing much better now with FastHotmail.
reviews.author: Jon Claerbout

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: It keep bringing up ads. And keep loving me out and all my mails are gone!  Hate it!
reviews.author: Samantha Francois

reviews.title: Completely useless!!
reviews.comment: Installed for 2mins then deleted. Will not sync to messages that are in your inbox. Says its empty. Waste of time.
reviews.author: Jason Boon

reviews.comment: Pushads galore
reviews.author: Mar Tin

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I downloaded it n it doesnt  work! Not happy
reviews.author: Deneeka Hazeldean
